title: David Remnick | GOP Says Trump Was Joking About China as Damning Ukraine Texts Emerge: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how more evidence is emerging in the impeachment inquiry into President Trump.

Then, he talks to David Remnick, editor of The New Yorker.
